document.full_text: nba leading rebounder kevin love injured his groin and walked off the court and did not return to action during the minnesota timberwolves' 127-95 loss to the sacramento kings on sunday.
document.title: all star love injured in timberwolves' blowout loss
lines_and_colors: nba leading rebounder kevin love injured his groin and walked off the court and did not return to action during the minnesota timberwolves' 127-95 loss to the sacramento kings on sunday.
